reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable with stretchy material, and perfect for curvy bodies, with one noting it's particularly suitable for hot summer weddings. Moreover, the dress fits beautifully and offers good value for money. However, opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too short in the front. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress for the price.
items.body: Amazing dress. For a very affordable dress I bought for a production, I ended up wearing it a few more times. Looks great, I could fit in both medium and large. It really looks more expensive than it is. Read more
items.author: Athlete

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had to size down, but â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸!!!
items.body: My measurements are as follows: 5â€™7â€, 35â€ chest (34/36B bra), 28â€ waist, 38â€ hip. According to the size chart, medium is my size. The medium, however, was too big in the chest, I just couldnâ€™t fill it out, but the bottom half fit nicely (although long all around). So I decided to try a Small and it fit me like a glove (I am wearing a SMALL in the attached pics). Still a bit long, I will have to have it hemmed and Iâ€™ll likely remove or fold down the frilly lace detail at the top. The dress is a bit transparent, I will wear it with a strapless bra and a half slip skirt. The material is soft, the dress is a beautiful creamy white. Came out of the bag without wrinkles. Very comfortable, the arms are a little itchy, I can be sensitive about such things, but not so itchy that itâ€™s a big bother or a dealbreaker. Itâ€™s stretchy to fit many body shapes. Beautiful quality for the price. Iâ€™m having a casual backyard wedding, with a dark fairytale vibe. If youâ€™re not a bridezilla, looking for an affordable, romantic, unique, low-fuss dress, this could work for you. Read more
items.author: Melissa Shirk

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Z-orange, Pink, Short Sleeve White, White, Blue, Purple, White1, Black, Light Pink, Black1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
